name: Final Duck
description:
Final Duck is an action game for Windows.
Your object is to get to the exit.
You can go out of reach by dashing.
When you touch the enemy, your heart gauge will decrease.
Once you are out of it, the game is a failure. Or if you touch the circle, the game is a failure.

Controls
Arrow keys.... Select, Move [Z]........... Start, Jump [X]........... Dash [C]........... Attack

If would like to support my works, please consider backing me on patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pigmhall
